TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WindowClosedEventArgs extends System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEventArgs
Public NotInheritable Class WindowClosedEventArgs Inherits AutomationEventArgs

summary.span: 包含視窗關閉時所引發之事件的相關資訊。

span.span: Contains information about the event that is raised when a window is closed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要關閉視窗的事件訂閱，呼叫，並指定中`eventId`參數，並提供[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]採用的事件處理常式參數。To subscribe to window-closed events, call , specifying in the `eventId` parameter and supplying an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] event handler that takes a parameter. 當您的應用程式收到視窗關閉事件，`sender`事件處理常式的參數不能用來取得已關閉的視窗的詳細資訊，因為對應[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]項目已不再有效。When your application receives a window-closed event, the `sender` parameter of the event handler cannot be used to obtain information about the window that has closed, because the corresponding [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element is no longer valid. ## Examples 如需範例程式碼，請參閱 。For example code, see .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32[] runtimeId) cil managed

param.name: runtimeId
param.span: 已關閉之視窗的執行階段識別項。

span.span: The runtime identifier of the window that has closed.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int32[] GetRuntimeId() cil managed

summary.span: 擷取與此事件關聯的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]執行階段[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)]。

span.span: Retrieves the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] runtime [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] associated with this event.

returns.span: 引發事件所在視窗的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 執行階段識別碼。

span.span: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] runtime ID of the window on which the event was raised.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您的應用程式收到視窗關閉事件，`sender`事件處理常式的參數不能用來取得已關閉的視窗的詳細資訊，因為對應[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tlasharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]項目已不再有效。When your application receives a window-closed event, the `sender` parameter of the event handler cannot be used to obtain information about the window that has closed, because the corresponding [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tlasharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element is no longer valid. 使用來比對 視窗具有已知的識別項。Use to match the window with a known identifier. ## Examples 在下列範例中，視窗關閉事件處理常式會確定已關閉之視窗的執行階段識別碼是否開啟視窗的識別碼清單。In the following example, the handler for the window-closed event ascertains whether the runtime ID of the closed window is in a list of the IDs of open windows. 如果執行階段識別碼存在，它會從清單中移除。If the runtime ID is present, it is removed from the list. [!code-csharp[UIAFocusTracker_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAFocusTracker_snip/CSharp/FocusTracker.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAFocusTracker_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAFocusTracker_snip/VisualBasic/FocusTracker.vb#101)]
